title: REQUIREMENTS for I want to create a subscription based social_media...
content:
# Requirement Document for: I want to create a subscription based social_media_platform 

## 1. Introduction
This document outlines the core requirements for the proposed solution.

## 2. Functional Requirements
- **User Authentication**: System must support secure login/signup.
- **core Feature**: The system shall implement the main logic for I want to create a subscription based social_media_platform .
- **Dashboard**: User dashboard to view metrics.

## 3. Non-Functional Requirements
- **Performance**: < 200ms response time.
- **Security**: Data encryption at rest and in transit.

title: PLANNING for I want to create a subscription based social_media...
content:
# Project Plan
    
## Phases
1. **MVP**: Core features of I want to create a subscription based social_media_platform .
2. **Phase 2**: Advanced Analytics.
